Name: Bullwackie
Review Text: Bullwackie staff are the most disrespectful scammers I have ever seen in Amsterdam, and I have seen a lot of those. DO NOT BUY AT THIS SHOP

Name: Bullwackie
Review Text: I was comming here years ago. I've back. I bought for 50$ guy in hat treated me like air. None important person. After finished shopping just sayed "bye" and go another person. Didn't asked i want any papers or filters. Didn't smile. I have this in other coffeshops, so just gonna return to them

Name: Bullwackie
Review Text: I'm a frequent customer and today I was given the 'last gram' of a batch. I came home and weighed it only to find out I was given less than 1 gram even though the guy did say it was a full gram.

Review Text: People on the counter are very friendly!! Stuff is good

Name: Bullwackie
Review Text: 2 people who work there are extremely rude, although the other personnel members are nice, furthermore the weed is bad quality, yet their weed is expensive at the same time, the cash dispenser machine is often broken, a better coffeeshop would be de prijs located at suriname plein, about 5 minutes distance from this coffeeshop.

Name: Bullwackie
Review Text: Nice little selection of hash,more on weed...tried few of them and never disappointed me. Very close to a canal,good place to chill
